siteDescription: DPX Public Sale will be live on 21st June

introduction.title: Participate in Defi's most advanced options protocol
introduction.paragraph: Dopex's mainnet launch this summer on Ethereum and L2 marks a new moment for unrestricted and gas efficient options trading.

body.description: Familiarize yourself with the sale with these simple pointers.

0.heading: Date & Supply
0.paragraph: Total of 75,000 DPX (15% of total supply) will be available in exchange for ETH via the deposit contract.

1.heading: Deposit Contract
1.paragraph: The contract accepts deposits until DPX reaches its max price or the sale concludes by June 24th, 2021.

2.heading: Fair Distribution
2.paragraph: Claimable DPX will be based on their share of total deposits at the end. In other words, there is no front-running and being first or last doesn’t matter.

3.heading: Sale Distribution
3.helperText: The sale follows a linear graph that determines the final token price for every participant.

4.heading: DPX Emission and Allocation
4.helperText: The token sale allocation above is a sum of the public sale and early investors allocation.

features.paragraph: DPX is the native protocol token. Issued on Ethereum as a standard ERC-20 token, it will be utilized as the de-facto governance token on Dopex.

0.heading: Governance Token
0.paragraph: DPX is used to vote on protocol and app level proposals.

1.heading: Dual Token Model
1.paragraph: Option Writers get rDPX that can be used for synthetic assets.

2.heading: Protocol Income
2.paragraph: Holders receive revenue from Dopex’s protocol over time..

3.heading: Platform Rewards
3.paragraph: Option Pool liquidity providers receive DPX emissions.

roadMap.paragraph: From decentralized leverage to synthetic assets. Find out what has gotten the team excited about the future of Dopex.

faq.paragraph: We enjoy answering your questions in person when possible but please check our FAQ below before pinging our team on Discord

0.question: What are both Tokens used for?
0.answer: Dopex makes use of two tokens for the protocol to work in a synergistic manner • DPX - vanilla governance and protocol fee accrual token • rDPX - rebate token - also used for protocol usage Learn more about DPX and its Bull Thesis here.

1.question: Will it be a classic token sale (first come, first served)?
1.answer: Yes. Users can deposit ETH until a max cap or deadline is reached.

2.question: Are any countries excluded from the public token sale?
2.answer: All OFAC sanctioned countries are excluded (including US).

3.question: Where can I read more on Tokenomics (lock-up, emission schedule, etc.)?
3.answer: You can read everything about our tokenomics in our documentation here - https://docs.dopex.io/tokenomics
